aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Technophile passionate about science, entrepreneurship, and marketing, as well as cinema, travel, and animals. Fifth-year student at EPITECH, passionate and eager to learn, I want to enrich my skills in a stimulating and challenging environment that offers motivating opportunities for growth.
aboutMe.myJourneyDescription: My journey at EPITECH has allowed me to work on numerous rich and varied projects. These projects have initially allowed me to discover the C and C++ languages and the UNIX environment, and to develop the habit of self-learning and seeking information independently. Then, programming game servers and APIs, mobile applications, as well as project management in groups. In the process of becoming a freelancer, I am also actively looking for clients to carry out missions. My focus is mainly on BACK-END and MOBILE programming in REACT NATIVE.

experience.title: Experience
experience.fullStackDeveloperDescription: This 4-month internship allowed me to understand and intervene in production on the company's numerous technologies.
experience.reactNativeDeveloper: React Native Developer at Relax Max
experience.reactNativeDeveloperDescription: Creation of a complete React Native application with Redux.
experience.fullStackDeveloperCSharpDescription: Creation of a construction site management dashboard website in ASP.NET MVC with database, account management, and Azure services.
experience.cCppProjectsDescription: Numerous projects at EPITECH aimed at discovering and manipulating the UNIX environment, Shell, Network management, Multi-threading, and Algorithms.
experience.pythonProjectsDescription: School projects: Scripts, Jupyter Notebook. Notions of Scikit-learn, Pandas, and Machine learning.
